entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Buchans
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:19 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Millertown 4:30 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -6.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -11.6°C
Wind: SW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14 except minus 18 in low lying areas. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14 except minus 18 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snow beginning early in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries. Windy. High minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023
